name: Take Me Home
description:
Take Me Home tells the story of a wolf trying to go back to his home. It is a strategy game based on a third-person perspective. As the wolf, you have to survive and take on all the dangers of the world. On your journey, you will encounter many puzzles and challenges that you have to overcome. You will experience a beautiful world full of colors and marvelous nature, go experience this world, and find your home!

Key Features:

  • It is inspired by "The First Tree."
  • For the people that enjoy open worlds with amazing visuals.
  • It is not a simple walking simulator, but a game full of wonders and mystery.
  • You have to use your imagination to put together your own story.
